11#include <GKlib.h>
12
13
14
15
16/*********************************************************/
17/* ! \brief Initializes the <tt>gk_seq_t</tt> variable
18
19
20
21
22\param A pointer to gk_seq_t itself
23\returns null
24*/
25/***********************************************************************/
26
27void gk_seq_init(gk_seq_t *seq)
28{
29
30 seq->len = 0;
31 seq->sequence = NULL;
32
33 seq->pssm = NULL;
34 seq->psfm = NULL;
35
36 seq->name = NULL;
37
38}
39
40/***********************************************************************/
41/*! \brief This function creates the localizations for the various sequences
42
43\param string i.e amino acids, nucleotides, sequences
44\returns gk_i2cc2i_t variable
45*/
46/*********************************************************************/
47
48gk_i2cc2i_t *gk_i2cc2i_create_common(char *alphabet)
49{
50
51
52 int nsymbols;
53 gk_idx_t i;
54 gk_i2cc2i_t *t;
55
56 nsymbols = strlen(s: alphabet);
57 t = gk_malloc(nbytes: sizeof(gk_i2cc2i_t),msg: "gk_i2c_create_common");
58 t->n = nsymbols;
59 t->i2c = gk_cmalloc(n: 256, msg: "gk_i2c_create_common");
60 t->c2i = gk_imalloc(n: 256, msg: "gk_i2c_create_common");
61
62
63 gk_cset(n: 256, val: -1, x: t->i2c);
64 gk_iset(n: 256, val: -1, x: t->c2i);
65
66 for(i=0;i<nsymbols;i++){
67 t->i2c[i] = alphabet[i];
68 t->c2i[(int)alphabet[i]] = i;
69 }
70
71 return t;
72
73}
74
75
76/*********************************************************************/
77/*! \brief This function reads a pssm in the format of gkmod pssm
78
79\param file_name is the name of the pssm file
80\returns gk_seq_t
81*/
82/********************************************************************/
83gk_seq_t *gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM(char *filename)
84{
85 gk_seq_t *seq;
86 gk_idx_t i, j, ii;
87 size_t ntokens, nbytes, len;
88 FILE *fpin;
89
90
91 gk_Tokens_t tokens;
92 static char *AAORDER = "ARNDCQEGHILKMFPSTWYVBZX*";
93 static int PSSMWIDTH = 20;
94 char *header, line[MAXLINELEN];
95 gk_i2cc2i_t *converter;
96
97 header = gk_cmalloc(n: PSSMWIDTH, msg: "gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM: header");
98
99 converter = gk_i2cc2i_create_common(alphabet: AAORDER);
100
101 gk_getfilestats(fname: filename, r_nlines: &len, r_ntokens: &ntokens, NULL, r_nbytes: &nbytes);
102 len --;
103
104 seq = gk_malloc(nbytes: sizeof(gk_seq_t),msg: "gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM");
105 gk_seq_init(seq);
106
107 seq->len = len;
108 seq->sequence = gk_imalloc(n: len, msg: "gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM");
109 seq->pssm = gk_iAllocMatrix(ndim1: len, ndim2: PSSMWIDTH, value: 0, errmsg: "gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM");
110 seq->psfm = gk_iAllocMatrix(ndim1: len, ndim2: PSSMWIDTH, value: 0, errmsg: "gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM");
111
112 seq->nsymbols = PSSMWIDTH;
113 seq->name = gk_getbasename(path: filename);
114
115 fpin = gk_fopen(filename,"r","gk_seq_ReadGKMODPSSM");
116
117
118 /* Read the header line */
119 if (fgets(s: line, MAXLINELEN-1, stream: fpin) == NULL)
120 errexit("Unexpected end of file: %s\n", filename);
121 gk_strtoupper(line);
122 gk_strtokenize(line, delim: " \t\n", tokens: &tokens);
123
124 for (i=0; i<PSSMWIDTH; i++)
125 header[i] = tokens.list[i][0];
126
127 gk_freetokenslist(tokens: &tokens);
128
129
130 /* Read the rest of the lines */
131 for (i=0, ii=0; ii<len; ii++) {
132 if (fgets(s: line, MAXLINELEN-1, stream: fpin) == NULL)
133 errexit("Unexpected end of file: %s\n", filename);
134 gk_strtoupper(line);
135 gk_strtokenize(line, delim: " \t\n", tokens: &tokens);
136
137 seq->sequence[i] = converter->c2i[(int)tokens.list[1][0]];
138
139 for (j=0; j<PSSMWIDTH; j++) {
140 seq->pssm[i][converter->c2i[(int)header[j]]] = atoi(nptr: tokens.list[2+j]);
141 seq->psfm[i][converter->c2i[(int)header[j]]] = atoi(nptr: tokens.list[2+PSSMWIDTH+j]);
142 }
143
144
145
146 gk_freetokenslist(tokens: &tokens);
147 i++;
148 }
149
150 seq->len = i; /* Reset the length if certain characters were skipped */
151
152 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&header, LTERM);
153 gk_fclose(fpin);
154
155 return seq;
156}
157
158
159/**************************************************************************/
160/*! \brief This function frees the memory allocated to the seq structure.
161
162\param gk_seq_t
163\returns nothing
164*/
165/**************************************************************************/
166void gk_seq_free(gk_seq_t *seq)
167{
168 gk_iFreeMatrix(r_matrix: &seq->pssm, ndim1: seq->len, ndim2: seq->nsymbols);
169 gk_iFreeMatrix(r_matrix: &seq->psfm, ndim1: seq->len, ndim2: seq->nsymbols);
170 gk_free(ptr1: (void **)&seq->name, &seq->sequence, LTERM);
171 //gk_free((void **)&seq, LTERM);
172 gk_free(ptr1: (void **) &seq, LTERM);
173
174}
